thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: We'll Probably Stop Looking
thread.title_full: We'll Probably Stop Looking - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: HKLUSA
title: We'll Probably Stop Looking
text: The Club Quarters is right off Liberty Park, next to the World Trade Center Memorial. Its location is fantastic, right near a ton of subways, but it's not the best part of this hotel. Great bed, friendly folks, nice room an great amenities for a very reasonable (for NYC) price. It's got a great rooftop bar and we had a great view of WTC from our room. We've stayed in a few Manhattan hotels, and all have been very good, but this was the best.
